fragment.title: WP Tech - a revisit of a tech agency's visual identity
fragment.desc: A complete rebranding of a full-solution tech agency. The project covered setting up a visual identity for the agency, logo and graphical design, UX/UI design for a new website.

page.title: WP Tech - a revisit of a tech agency's visual identity
page.desc: A complete rebranding of a full-solution tech agency. The project covered setting up a visual identity for the agency, logo and graphical design, UX/UI design for a new website.
page.overview: As a newly formed tech agency was looking to make a break on the tech market. They were looking to rebrand themselves and update their visual identity. The goal with the project was to create a new logotype, website, create templates for social media posts, and to structure a visual identity that aligned with the tech agencys' mission.
